ticket.title: regression (1864): Can't store non-ActiveRecord models in session
ticket.original-body:
The error in ticket 1864, squashed in earlier release candidates, has returned in rc3. It happens when the result page is rendered after the action:
/!\ FAILSAFE /!\ Sat Mar 07 19:03:09 -0800 2009 Status: 500 Internal Server Error undefined class/module Cart /Users/rdclark/.gem/ruby/1.8/gems/activerecord-2.3.0/lib/active_record/session_store.rb:67:in `dump' /Users/rdclark/.gem/ruby/1.8/gems/activerecord-2.3.0/lib/active_record/session_store.rb:67:in `marshal'
